ygData.subject: RE: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t think we ever said he would solo.  bards cannot ever solo either from what I m hearing after level 25 or so. ... From: jhenders@bogon.com
ygData.messageBody:
Don't think we ever said he would solo. bards cannot ever solo either from
what I'm hearing after level 25 or so.

-----Original Message-----
From: jhenders@... [mailto:jhenders@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 30, 1999 5:07 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Hey this sounded interesting..


From: jhenders@...

On Thu, Sep 30/99, kim@... wrote:
> From: kim@...
>
> On Thu, 30 Sep 1999, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
>
> > articles proclaiming Shamans to be the ultimate warrior class. Buff
like
> > mad, rush into melee cause you're big, strong, have armor equal to a
ranger,
> > and a big stick to swing.
>
> A shaman who does this at higher levels is going to be turned
> into puree. Armor helps, but not as much as parry and
> riposte.

As well, this is a total misreading of Eduin's article. He advocates
Shamans melee as_part_of_a_group. I've played with Eduin and he's not
crazy enough to try to melee solo at high levels either. He just noticed
what a lot of us already knew, if you don't spend most of your time
sitting on your butt meditating, you get more exp and have more fun.


--
